document.body:
Grocery Coupon Helper
Times are tough and saving money is important. Coupon savings with out the research.
Posts tagged‘Fuze Coupon’ Aug 26 Fuze–FREE
King Soopers has Fuze Drinks on sale for $1/ea this week. This Tuesday’s ads had a coupon for .55/1.
Jan 21 Fuze–Free
Albertson’s has Fuze drinks on sale 10/$10 this week. If you use the coupon for 25 cents off one it will be FREE. Albertson’s is quadrupling coupons up to 25 cents off this week. Jan 05 Fuze–$.50 or FREE
This Sunday’s paper had an coupon for 25 cents off a bottle of Fuze, and an additional coupon for 55 cents off a bottle of Fuze. The second coupon was located in the King Soopers insert. Our local King Soopers doubles coupons and Fuze is on sale 10/$10. I was able to purchase two Fuze drinks for 50 cents.
